self_predictions.prediction_summary: Fia believes she will win despite acknowledging Ekaterina's strong technique and confidence. She mentions her own competitive spirit and readiness to fight.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Fia is an outside puller, while Ekaterina is strong in pronation and side pressure, which could pose a problem.

Ekaterina Nikisheva.strength: Very strong in pronation and side pressure.
Ekaterina Nikisheva.previous_match_summary: Ekaterina has won Europeans and Worlds in her prime years (2017-2019) and claims to be lifting the same weights now.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Fia believes Devon has progressed since their last match and thinks he can win, though she acknowledges it will be tough.

Devon Larratt.strength: Devon has progressed significantly since their last match.
Devon Larratt.health: Devon has healed and improved his movements post-stem cell treatment.
Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Devon felt something in their previous match that gave him hope he could find a way to win.

Levan Saginashvili.strength: Levan is the strongest super heavyweight Fia has ever seen.
Levan Saginashvili.health: Levan has been injured and focused on other things since their last match.
Levan Saginashvili.previous_match_summary: Levan won their last match decisively.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Fia predicts Mindaugus will win, noting their past matches and Mindaugus's confidence.

Mindaugus Tarasaitis.strength: Confident and has beaten Artur before.
Mindaugus Tarasaitis.previous_match_summary: Mindaugus has won most of their past matches, except one where Artur won.

Artur Makarov.strength: Can go inside or use back pressure and side pressure.
Artur Makarov.previous_match_summary: Artur won one match against Mindaugus but lost others.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Fia thinks Frank will win, noting his current strength and past performance against Michael.

Michael Todd.strength: Strong, especially in the King's Move.
Michael Todd.previous_match_summary: Michael won their last match 15 years ago.

Frank Lamparelli.strength: Very strong now, possibly the strongest he has been.
Frank Lamparelli.previous_match_summary: Frank gave a good match to Reno Masic recently.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Fia finds this match hard to predict, noting both are strong and have different styles.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Georgi is a pure top roller, while Kurdecha can also go outside.

Alex Kurdecha.previous_match_summary: Kurdecha has improved since their last match.

Georgi Tsvetkov.previous_match_summary: Georgi is a pure top roller.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Fia predicts Irakli will win, noting his recent strong performances and confidence.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Irakli is a top roller, while Sasho goes inside.

Irakli Zirakashvili.previous_match_summary: Irakli has looked strong in recent competitions.

Sasho Andreev.previous_match_summary: Sasho won their last match 3 years ago.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin believes Fia will win, noting her competitive spirit and past performances.

Fia Reisik.strength: Strong and competitive, especially in matches.
Fia Reisik.previous_match_summary: Fia has beaten heavier opponents before.

Ekaterina Nikisheva.strength: Very confident and strong in pronation and side pressure.
Ekaterina Nikisheva.previous_match_summary: Ekaterina has won Europeans and Worlds in her prime.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin acknowledges Devon's progress but is unsure if it will be enough to beat Levan.

Devon Larratt.strength: Devon has progressed significantly since their last match.
Devon Larratt.health: Devon has healed and improved his movements post-stem cell treatment.
Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Devon felt something in their previous match that gave him hope.

Levan Saginashvili.strength: Levan is the strongest super heavyweight Engin has ever seen.
Levan Saginashvili.health: Levan has been injured and focused on other things since their last match.
Levan Saginashvili.previous_match_summary: Levan won their last match decisively.
